title: Chicken Assassin: Reloaded (GOG) Giveaway
description: Chickens can be surprisingly badass! Download Chicken Assassin: Reloaded for free on GOG! Chicken Assassin: Reloaded is a fast paced action-RPG with an outrageous storyline, colorful enemies and visually stunning environments.
instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Click the "Go to giveaway" green button and you will be redirected to the GOG home page
3. Scroll down until you find the game banner.
4. Click the "Get it Free" button and login into your GOG account to unlock the game.
